content:
1. Presque Isle State Park - this popular park offers scenic views of Lake Erie, beaches, lighthouses, and picturesque landscapes. 

2. Erie Maritime Museum - Visit the museum and snap a photo of the historic U.S. Brig Niagara. 

3. Lake Erie Arboretum at Frontier Park - This park provides a variety of beautiful landscapes features, including wetlands, forests, and natural habitats. 

4. Erie Bicentennial Tower - Take a ride to the top of the landmark to capture gorgeous city and lake views. 

5. Downtown Erie - The city’s vibrant downtown area offers plenty of opportunities for street photography, capturing the bustling energy of the city. 

6. Waldameer Park and Water World - Capture your favorite moments on the roller coasters, water slides and enjoy family fun. 

7. Erie Art Museum - A must-visit places for art lovers, take a few photos of the artistic and cultural ambiance. 

8. The Erie Zoo - The zoo grounds are decorated weel with plants, trees and animals that is a perfect location for your next shoot. 

9. Erie Canal – Provides scenic views of Erie area, you could take photos of the colorful landscape, bridges and rustic boats. 

10. Asbury Woods Nature Center - A great place to capture some outdoor nature shots with a variety of trails and nature exhibits.
